content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li

content: Hello Bo Li, thank you for coming to see the apartment. Based on our discussion, we propose a rental price of 700 Euros per month. Would you agree to this price?
name: Bo Li

content:
What would you say to the tenant? Suppose they say no? [
HEINE: I will try to negotiate with the tenant. If the tenant is unwilling to accept the proposed price, I will try to increase it by 50 Euros. What is your counteroffer?

BO LI: I am sorry, I don't think that the apartment is worth that much. My budget is only 600 Euros per month. I was wondering if there was any room for negotiation.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: HEINE: Understood. Based on our discussion, I am willing to negotiate with you. Perhaps we can agree on a rental price of 650 Euros per month. Would you agree to this price?
name: Bo Li

content:
What would you say to the tenant? Suppose they say yes?
HEINE: I am glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 650 Euros per month. Thank you for your interest in the apartment. Is there anything else you need to know before signing the lease agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: BO LI: No, that's all I need to know. Thank you for your understanding and flexibility. I am excited to move into this apartment.
name: Bo Li
